camel.kamelet.nats-sink.servers.name: camel.kamelet.nats-sink.servers
camel.kamelet.nats-sink.servers.description: Comma separated list of NATS Servers

camel.kamelet.nats-sink.jetstreamEnabled.name: camel.kamelet.nats-sink.jetstreamEnabled
camel.kamelet.nats-sink.jetstreamEnabled.description: Sets whether to enable JetStream support for this endpoint.

camel.kamelet.nats-sink.jetstreamName.name: camel.kamelet.nats-sink.jetstreamName
camel.kamelet.nats-sink.jetstreamName.description: Sets the name of the JetStream stream to use.

camel.kamelet.nats-sink.jetstreamAsync.name: camel.kamelet.nats-sink.jetstreamAsync
camel.kamelet.nats-sink.jetstreamAsync.description: Sets whether to operate JetStream requests asynchronously.
